column4: I need urgent holp on networking: A friend is over with a lappy that has a Windows partition and a Linux partition (we don't know the password)... We need to copy a few things we need to copy from my Linux box to the lappy. Anyone have an idea?
the Linux one on the lappy
> thenboot the lap on windows, share a folder with rw access and copy the files on it from your ubuntu
How do I do that from Ubuntu?
> it should work well without it
> it's faster and can do mp3 :p
yes, thank you very much :) It doesn't work.
I could burst out laughing when I first noticed it...
